    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140359</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140359</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Električno senčenje</string>
            <string language="en">Electric shadow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrischer Schatten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ombre électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sombra elétrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ombra elettrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρική σκιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sombra eléctrica</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Med dva nabita valja postavimo prevodno ploščo in jo napolnimo z nabitimi delci ter opazujemo razporeditev.</string>
            <string language="en">Plate is placed between two charged cylinders and filled with charged particles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">naboj</string>
            <string language="en">charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">razporeditev naboja</string>
            <string language="en">charge distribution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vektor sile</string>
            <string language="en">force vector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jacob</string>
            <string language="en">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Platte wird zwischen zwei belastete Zylinder 
plaziert und gefüllt mit belasteten Partikeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le plat est placé entre deux cylindres chargés 
et rempli de particules chargées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A placa é colocada entre dois cilindros 
carregados e enchida com as partículas carregadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La piastra è disposta fra due cilindri caricati 
ed è riempita di particelle caricate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πιάτο τοποθετείται μεταξύ δύο χρέωσε τους 
κυλίνδρους και γέμισε με τα χρεωμένα μόρια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La placa se coloca entre dos cilindros cargados y
se llena de las partículas cargadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladung Verteilung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraftvektor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">distribution de charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vecteur de force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carga</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">distribuição da carga</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vetor da força</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
